item.title: Suitable is the Best: Task-Oriented Knowledge Fusion in Vulnerability Detection
item.description: KF-GVD: a novel knowledge fusion-based method boosts vulnerability detection accuracy by integrating task-specific knowledge into graph neural networks, achieving significant performance gains and dis…
